71 
72 def thumbnail():
73  icon = base64.decodestring(iconstr)
74  return icon
75 
76 if __name__ == "__main__":
77  icon = thumbnail()
78  f = file("thumbnail.png","wb")
79  f.write(icon)
80  f.close()
